title: Twist the End
content: Have you ever envisioned Jack and Rose getting their happy ending? Here's your chance to bring your imagination and creativity to the forefront. Twist the end, challenges all the adventurous and artistic minds out there to a battle of ideas. Unveil the storyteller in you and suggest an alternate ending to a famous movie and win exciting prizes.
Choose one of the movies mentioned below, the details of point from which you have to twist the story and the submission link will be provided at [9PM 24/10/18]

In the movie THE DARK KNIGHT, Coleman Reese, accountant at wayne enterprises, declares that he knows the identity of Batman and then Joker threatens to destroy a hospital unless Reese is killed within an hour. So, change the movie from the scene where Bruce Wayne speeds away in his Lamborghini Murcielago LP640....
HOW TO TRAIN YOUR DRAGON PART-1

In the movie HOW TO TRAIN YOUR DRAGON PART-1, Hiccup particpates in tournament (where he has to fight with dragons) and try to convice his people by leaving the shield, but the dragon out of fear attacks hiccup. Then,Night Fury (Toothless) tries to save hiccup, but his father attacks toothless. Hiccup shouts No!!. So, change the movie from this scene where Hiccupâ€™s father attacks night fury...
